tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE home_assessments (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_type VARCHAR,
  assessed_value DECIMAL,
  appraisal_date DATE,
  underwriting_criteria TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE appraisals (
    appraisal_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT NOT NULL,
    appraisal_date DATE NOT NULL,
    appraised_value DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    appraiser_name VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE HomeAssessments (
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  property_address VARCHAR(255),
  assessment_date DATE,
  appraiser_name VARCHAR(100),
  appraisal_value DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE PolicyUnderwriting (
  underwriting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  policy_holder_name VARCHAR(100),
  policy_start_date DATE,
  policy_end_date DATE,
  risk_factor VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE AssessmentLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessment_id INT,
  log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE appraisals (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assessment_id INT,
    appraiser_name VARCHAR(255),
    appraisal_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    appraisal_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES home_assessments(id)
);

CREATE TABLE policy_underwriting (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(50),
    policy_holder VARCHAR(255),
    underwriter_name VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_id INT,
    appraisal_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (assessment_id) REFERENCES home_assessments(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (appraisal_id) REFERENCES appraisals(id)
);

CREATE TABLE insurance_policies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    policy_number VARCHAR(50),
    policy_holder VARCHAR(255),
    policy_type VARCHAR(50),
    premium_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
